==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|けい|たい|でん|わ|yomi=o}}

===Etymology===
Literally “handheld (portable) phone”.

Compound of {{m|ja|携帯||handheld|tr=keitai}} and {{m|ja|電話||telephone|tr=denwa}}.

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|けいたいでんわ}}

# {{lb|ja|cell phone}} [[cellular phone]], [[mobile phone]], [[cell phone]]

====Synonyms====
* {{sense|cell phone}} {{ja-r|携帯|けいたい}} (''colloquial'')
* {{ja-r|ハンディフォン}}

====Antonyms====
* {{ja-r|固定電話|こていでんわ}} (''fixed phone, landline'')

====Derived terms====
* {{sense|cell phone}} {{ja-r|携帯|けいたい}} (''colloquial'') <!-- the ''sense'' “cell phone” is derived -->
